All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    AppProperties
    Application properties.
    CommandLineArgs
    Command line parser and option container for the program.
    Dialog
    A JDialog specimen.
    Gbc
    Utility to create a GridBagConstraint object.
    Gui
    Utility class for the GUI (Graphical User Interface), supporting the project's GUI with several static methods.
    Logger
    Logger, a simple logging utility, could be a wrapper for java.util.Logger or log4j, you may be change to it in the future, of course.
    Main
    This application XXX does XXX (main entry) - it's your project and I don't know it.
    MainView
    The main view of this application.
    Message
    Uses hard coded messages as Enumeration, other languages could be added later, import this as static for convenience.
    Msg
    Msg (short for Message): a utility to provide strings/messages for other languages.
    Parser
    Simple parser for parsing text files.
    Usage
    Prints a usage of this program.
    Util
    Utility class, supporting the project with several static methods and constants.
    Version
    Version information of the project.
    XmlExample
    An example for writing and reading XML, copy, modify and divide this class according it to your needs.
    It uses three different inner class data objects (one containing another and a wrapped HashMap) to demonstrate the features of the template.xml packages.
    Reading back needs a handler for the XML tags, this example uses org.xml.sax.ext.DefaultHandler2.
    A real world implementation would not do all the stuff with inner classes, this is just for demonstration.
    XmlExample.State  
    XmlWritable
    An interface an object may implement to make it writable to XML using XmlWriter.
    XmlWriter
    Writes data (usually of an object) to a XML file.
